about_the_game:
Start an adventure where your business skills meet the competitive world of car trading. In this game, you navigate the challenging yet lucrative paths of the automotive world.

Begin with Modest, Aim for Greatness!

By honing your bargaining skills, you can purchase cars at affordable prices and modify them in your showroom to increase their value. This way, you’ll have the opportunity to sell the vehicles at a higher profit and boost your earnings. Additionally, you can create special collections by gathering rare and valuable cars, and offer these collections for sale to multiply your profits. But be careful; the automotive world doesn’t only operate through legal means. If you dare, you can take a risk and venture into darker paths, engaging in illegal activities to further increase your earnings. The choice is entirely yours.

Step into the Shadows

Are the legal routes starting to bore you? Then it’s time to step into the dark world. Instead of buying cars, you can use a lockpick to steal locked vehicles. Selling or dismantling these stolen cars offers a more dangerous but lucrative path. However, be cautious; the risk of getting caught is ever-present and can lead to severe consequences.

Is car theft not enough for you? Dare to go even deeper. Delve into the underworld and engage in various illegal activities, discovering different ways to rise in this dangerous realm. Remember, the rewards can be great, but the risks are just as high.

Dangerous Gains

As you delve deeper into this dark world, you’ll have the chance to earn significant profits by participating in various illegal activities. You might turn to risky businesses like weed cultivation and generate substantial income from these endeavors. By managing your workers effectively, you can create a profitable business model, but be vigilant; always be prepared for possible raids on your lab and potential product losses.

Over time, with the income you earn, you can undertake larger operations and strengthen your position in this dangerous world by enhancing your security. However, never forget that everything comes at a price in the illegal world. Plan your moves carefully, outsmart your rivals, and strive to survive in this shadowy realm.

Dominance

What’s your dream? Do you aspire to become an underworld leader who controls the city, or do you want to build a massive automotive trading empire through legal means? This journey, which you started with small steps, could lead you down different paths. Whether you choose to get involved in illegal activities and pursue a dangerous yet profitable route, or stick to buying and selling cars for a safe and steady progress, the decision is yours. Set your strategy with every step, defeat your enemies, and succeed in staying afloat in this world.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mature content, including depictions of criminal activities, drug use, display of weapons, and violence. Players can engage in illegal activities such as car theft, drug cultivation, and participation in underground races, all of which may involve violence and morally questionable decisions.

name: Illegal Dealership Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3200G or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon RX 570 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Navigate the cutthroat automotive world by buying, modifying, and selling cars for profit. Whether you build a legal empire or risk it all in the underworld of car theft and illegal activities, your choices shape your destiny. Will you rise as a legit dealer or dominate the shadows?
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
